scripts.dev:html: nodemon --watch *.html --watch pages/*.html --ext html --exec npm run process-html

scripts.theme:all: npm run update-theme && npm run process-html && npm run build:css
scripts.theme:deploy: npm run update-theme && npm run process-html && npm run build:css && echo 'âœ… Ready to deploy with updated theme and data attributes'
